column4: I've got a fresh install of 6.06 LTS and I'm trying to remove evms for obvious reasons, but aptitude is telling me that it will force a remove of ubuntu-standard which the packages.ubuntu.com notes should not be uninsrtalled... Is there a workaround?
just disabling evms in startup may be enough ('sudo update-rc.d -f evms remove'). btw i used to disable lvm too back in dapper days
